article_title: Capping the tax exclusion will not destroy employer health insurance

article_metadata.description: Employers and unions are solidly opposed to the Cadillac tax, but they also oppose any changes to the tax exclusion. The problem facing Congress is how to reform the tax code to promote better health insurance choices and greater fairness to low-income Americans.
